text:
When it comes to keeping track of diabetes, the manual process can be a bit of a pain. That's why we've seen a flurry of innovative solutions that leverage connected technology and smartphones to simplify the tracking, analysis and treatment monitoring for diabetics.

One such interesting solution is **CGM (Continuous Glucose Monitoring)** systems, designed to help people with diabetes, especially type 1 diabetes or frequent hypo/hyperglycemia (low/high blood sugar) episodes.

In this post, I want to introduce you to an Open-Source CGM System, called **"Nightscout"**, which uses IoT/Embedded Systems and Mobile technologies to empower diabetics worldwide!
